short_summary: The requirement is for Indigenous Cultural Competency Training Development services. The service will include the creation of a training program aimed at ensuring that all Canada Energy Regulator employees receive this training to change behaviors, perceptions towards others, and strive for cultural safety.
description: The purpose of this procurement is to select a supplier to provide Indigenous Cultural Competency Training Development services. The training will provide relevant cultural awareness by engaging in new techniques and reaching intended objectives. The training will cover the following areas: culture generalm, pracovni preferencie, behavior, diversity and inclusion, leadership and specific communication strategies to manage diversity and inclusion in the workplace.  To control this culture by training people this training will then be able to transforee behaviour protocols. The targeted sources servicing solution has started already.

full_summary:
### Master Services Agreement for Indigenous Cultural Competency Training Development
#### Important Dates
* **Publication Date**: Thursday, April 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: Monday, May 15, 2023, 4:00 PM (MST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Wednesday, May 24, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Saturday, June 30, 2024

#### Request for Proposal Synopsis
The Canada Energy Regulator intends to obtain services for the development, delivery, and facilitation of Indigenous Cultural Competency Training to support the attainment of cultural safety for CER employees. The contracted services will aim to encourage respectful relationships, attitudes, and behaviors towards Indigenous peoples and cultures. This initiative will ensure that CER employees have the knowledge and cultural awareness to promote understanding and respect.

#### Solicitation Information
* **Solicitation Number**: 84084-23-0028
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
* **Procurement Category**: Services
* **Notice Type**: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
* **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif (Competitive - Selective tendering)
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Request for Proposal Attachments
* A Request for Proposal document for detailed technical requirements
* A Question and Answer document
* A Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

You can visit the following web address to view the attachments: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4890/tender-document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4890/tender-document)

#### Vendor Contact Information
Owuor Okiro, Owuor.Okiro@cer-rec.gc.ca, (403) 604-6254
